aathmarthaya mul kota gath atham bahira kotas prajathanthrawadaye muwawen ratawala abhyanthara kriyadamayanta madihathwimata uthsaha darima ema ratawal menma kalapaya da asthawara wimata hethu wi athi bawa janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha prakasha kaleya.kalapayaka samaya ha sthawarathwaya godanangime di jathina්ge swairibhawaya ha bhaumika akhandathawa surakshitha wima athyawashya namuth kanagatuwata men ema mulika ayithiya lowa pura ullanghanaya wana bawath janadhipathiwaraya prakasha kaleya.goliya washayen welenda, mulopayika labhaya nisa ho deshiya washayen deshapalana balaya thahawuru kara ganime abhilashayen polambaawanu labu awashyathawan hambaa yana mema bahira balawegayange balaporoththuwa wanne asthawaraya athi kirimadayi saka sanka mathu wana bawath janadhipathiwaraya pawasiya.abhyanthara asamangiya athi kirima owunge mul piyawara bawa penwa dun janadhipathiwaraya abhyanthara nosansun bawa athi kirimata ha sayibar aparadha kirimata antharjalaya athulu samaja madhya jalayan dushitha lesa bhawitha kirima apa daka thibena kiweya.mowunge ilakkaya tharunayan bawath owun bahira kandayamwala waradi nyaya pathrayange iththan bawata pathwa athi bawath penwa dun janadhipathiwaraya mema samuluwen grahanaya kara gatha yuthu ha aamanthranaya kala yuthu bhayanaka upanathin mewa bawath prakasha kaleya.janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha mema adahas pala kale aasiyawe anthar kriyakarithwaya ha wishwasaya godanangime kriyamarga pilibanda hatharawana samuluwata chinaye shanhayi nuwara di eeye (21) ekwemini.bahira balawega wisin ekinekage desha simawange bhaumika akhandathawayata ella kerena tharjanawalin aaraksha wima sandaha shakthimath sahayogithawak athi kara ganimata aasiyawe anthar kriyakarithwaya ha wishwasaya godanagime kriyamarga pilibanda samuluwe samajikayanta kriya kala haki bawath janadhipathiwaraya penwa dunneya.dashaka thunak pura pelunu thrasthawadaye kaෲrathwayen shri lankawa min pas wasarakata pera midunu bawa penwa dun janadhipathiwaraya apage mithurange sahayogaya ha upakaraya nomathi wuye nam thama ratata me abhiyogaya jaya gatha nohaki wanu athi bawath prakasha kaleya.rata aarthika samruddhi mawathe thawaduratath gaman kirimata ida salasamin rate siyalu janathawata ekase setha salasanna wu samaye yugayak siya rajaya sarthakawa uda kara athi bawa penwa dun janadhipathiwaraya shri lankawen thrasthawadaya athuga damima, siya awashyatha wenuwen peni sitina kandayam wisin gena yana dandaniya kriyamargayata man pada thibima kanagatuwata karunak bawath janadhipathiwaraya kiweya.mema kriyamargaya wisin akhanda badhaka panawima awasanawak bawath kese wethath samayata, sthawarathwayata ha saubhagyayata erehi wishwa abhiyoga jaya ganima sandaha ada dawase awashyathawa wanne honda hitha ha sahodarathwaya bawath janadhipathiwaraya wadiduratath prakasha kaleya.aasiyawe anthar kriyakarithwaya ha wishwasaya godanangime kriyamarga pilibandasa muluwe sabhapathi, china janadhipathi shi jinping mahatha athulu rajya nayakayan pirisak da me awasthawata ek wi sitiyaha..
